item.title: No True Catholic?
item.description: No True Catholic? In today’s world, Catholics are troubled by the emergence of camps that harm the unity of the Church and scar the body of Christ. These two classifications could be divided simply into the â€œprogressiveâ€ or â€œtraditionalistâ€ categories with their own ideological bents and ideas of how they want the Church to run. First, the archetype of the progressive. The progressive sees the Church like any other institution of fallible human beings that can be subject to change with enough pressure.
